root.name: Godzilla: Save the Earth
root.description: Monsters Anguirus Baragon Destoroyah Gigan Godzilla 90's Godzilla 2000 Jet Jaguar King Ghidorah Kiryu Mechagodzilla Mecha-King Ghidorah Megaguirus Megalon MOGUERA Mothra Orga Rodan SpaceGodzilla In Godzilla: Save the Earth, a race of aliens threaten to destroy the planet. With their mind-controlled monsters only the King of Monsters, Godzilla, and his allies can stop them
